name: Orion, the Celestial Hegemon
text:
Continuous: During your opponent's turn, this card gains [-1000/-1000].
Continuous: At the beginning of your recovery phase, your opponent may pay 4. If he or she does, this card doesn't recover in this phase.
Continuous: If this card attacks a resonator, your opponent cannot block this card with any resonator other than the attacked one.
